SELECT t2.teacher_id, t3.name teacher_name, t3.class_fee, t3.assistant_fee, sum( CASE t2.type_num WHEN 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) AS teacher_count, sum( CASE t2.type_num WHEN 2 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) AS assistant_count, sum( CASE t2.type_num WHEN 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) * t3.class_fee AS total_class_fee, sum( CASE t2.type_num WHEN 2 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) * t3.assistant_fee AS total_assistant_fee, YEAR ( t1.date ) AS year, MONTH ( t1.date ) AS month FROM lesson t1 LEFT JOIN lesson_teacher t2 ON t2.lesson_id = t1.id LEFT JOIN staff t3 ON t2.teacher_id= t3.id
t2.teacher_id IS NOT NULL AND t1.state = 2
AND t2.teacher_id = #{param.teacherId}
AND ( t1.date >= #{param.startDate} and t1.date <= #{param.endDate} )
GROUP BY t2.teacher_id, YEAR ( t1.date ), MONTH ( t1.date )

SELECT date_format(date, '%Y-%m-%d') date, count( 0 ) num FROM lesson t1 WHERE t1.deleted != 1
AND t1.id in (select lesson_id from lesson_teacher where teacher_id = #{param.teacherId})
AND t1.id in (select lesson_id from lesson_student where student_id = #{param.studentId})
AND t1.date >= #{param.startDate} AND t1.date <= #{param.endDate} GROUP BY t1.date
